message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I think it's a great opportunity for you to get your hands on this amazing product. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you place on the product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $10500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand that you're trying to get a good deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $11500.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering your latest offer, I would like to counter with $11000 for the product.
I understand you're getting close to your target price, Bob. However, I'm still not willing to sell the product for $11000. I'm willing to give you a slight concession and offer it to you for $11250.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort in adjusting the price. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to counter with $11000 for the product.
Bob, I understand you're sticking to your price, but I'm not willing to go any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer the product to you for $11100.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your efforts in adjusting the price. Considering our previous discussions, I would like to counter with $11000 for the product.
